task.title: Configure LTE Dial-up
task.shortdesc: The Dial-up settings contain the dial up connection parameters. The SIM card will establish Internet communication with the CARRIER via the dialup connection parameters.

context.p: By default, you donâ€™t need to configure the dial-up settings. The PBX can identify the SIM card and dialup parameters to connect to the Internet.
You need to configure Dial-up settings in the following situations:

ul.li:
The SIM card is installed in a place where the carrier network is not covered.
Contact the carrier if the SIM card could connect to a non-local network, if the answer is yes, then ask the dial-up connection parameters from the carrier.
The SIM card carrier asks you to change dial-up settings, so that you can connect to a specific network or another carrier network.

p.note: Configure the dial-up settings under the guidance of your carrier, or the cellular network will fail.

step.cmd: Go to Settings System Network Cellular Network .
Enter the parameters provided by the ISP.
Click Save, reboot the PBX to take effect.
